tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of the workshop.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare your OCI tenant
tutorials.description: This lab will show you how to set up your OCI tenant in order to have your Unique Security Experience.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Get delighted with your first Unique Security Experience
Lab 3: Automatic activation of Cloud Guard
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
